languages.text: "У вас был шанс решить вопрос полюбовно, регент".

traits.locale_text: "У вас был шанс решить вопрос полюбовно, регент".

languages.text: "You were given a chance to resolve the issue amicably, Regent."

languages.text: “我给过你友好解决问题的机会，摄政王。”
languages.original_text: "You were given a chance to resolve the issue amicably, Regent."

traits.locale_text: “我给过你友好解决问题的机会，摄政王。”

languages.text: «Se le dio la oportunidad de resolver el asunto de forma pacífica, regente».
languages.original_text: "You were given a chance to resolve the issue amicably, Regent."

traits.locale_text: «Se le dio la oportunidad de resolver el asunto de forma pacífica, regente».

languages.text: 「問題を穏便に解決するチャンスが与えられたのだよ、摂政」
languages.original_text: "You were given a chance to resolve the issue amicably, Regent."

traits.locale_text: 「問題を穏便に解決するチャンスが与えられたのだよ、摂政」

languages.text: "Ihr hattet die Chance, die Angelegenheit gütlich zu klären, Regent."
languages.original_text: "You were given a chance to resolve the issue amicably, Regent."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hattet die Chance, die Angelegenheit gütlich zu klären, Regent."

languages.text: « Vous aviez là une chance de résoudre ce conflit de manière pacifique, régent... »
languages.original_text: "You were given a chance to resolve the issue amicably, Regent."

traits.locale_text: « Vous aviez là une chance de résoudre ce conflit de manière pacifique, régent... »

languages.text: "Sana bu konuyu dostane bir şekilde halletme seçeneği verdik Naip."
languages.original_text: "You were given a chance to resolve the issue amicably, Regent."

traits.locale_text: "Sana bu konuyu dostane bir şekilde hâlletme seçeneği verildi Naip."
